faq.question: What is Protal?
faq.answer: It's an online social media platform to help people showcase their raw talents

faq.question: What is your role as an intern?
faq.answer: To work on various React components and implement them on the beta website

faq.question: How long is the internship period?
Will I receive a certificate of completion?
faq.answer: On completeion of the given tasks in the given time period, you will receive a certificate and an LOR based on your performance

faq.question: Can I continue as a Protal memeber even after the completion of my internship?
